TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Swasal, title = Swasal, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Swasal} }

S.FORM: Swasal Itiniay i Zhuoxi Cen no Hualien ko Swasal a niyaro', 161 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 509 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 494 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 15 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Truku74%, Bunun7%, Tayal6%, Amis2%, Seediq1%, roma7%.

Swasal Itiniay i Zhooxi Cen no Hoalien ko Swasal a niyaro', 161 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 509 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 494 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 15 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Troko74%, Bonon7%, Tayal6%, Amis2%, Seediq1%, roma7%.
